name: One Day More
description:
Created in a week for Godot Wild Jam #22

1832, Paris. A lone group of rebels is trapped defending the small Saint-Denis rue barricade. Play as Enjolras, Grantaire or Eponine, hold the army for as long as you can and fight till your death.

  • Simple arcade Space Invaders like shooter
  • Three playable characters with their own abilities
  • Different kinds of enemies
  • No win condition, just hold for as long as you can

Music:  Les Misérables - Backing Tracks by Songs Of The Stage  (https://thesongsofthestage.bandcamp.com/) - check these guys out, they're awesome!

Sorry for all the bugs and weird unfinished things you may encounter - fell sick at the end of the jam, so don't have energy to polish things out. Hope you still enjoy it!

P.S. There's no reasonable explanation why Eponine has explosive bullets, and it makes absolutely no sense, but hey, it's fun
